title: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop M2 Pro chip with 12‑core CPU and 19‑core GPU: 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR Display, 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage. Works with iPhone/iPad; Space Gray
descriptions:
Power meets pro. The 2023 MacBook Pro with M2 Pro is built to crush demanding workflows and elevate every creative moment.

- Blazing performance: The M2 Pro chip packs a 12‑core CPU and 19‑core GPU for lightning‑fast edits, renders, code builds, and multitasking. Launch massive projects, compile in Xcode, or finesse 8K timelines in Adobe Creative Cloud and Affinity Designer without breaking a sweat.
- Stunning 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display: Experience Extreme Dynamic Range, HDR, and pro reference modes with over 1000 nits of brightness for breathtaking contrast, true-to-life color, and precision color grading.
- All‑day power: Up to 22 hours of battery life so you can create, code, and stream from anywhere.
- Pro‑grade camera and audio: Look and sound your best with a 1080p FaceTime HD camera, studio‑quality three‑mic array, and an immersive six‑speaker sound system with Spatial Audio.
- Essential pro ports: Three Thunderbolt 4 ports, HDMI, SDXC card slot, and a headphone jack—plus fast, secure MagSafe charging. Connect high‑resolution displays, fast storage, and pro audio gear with ease.
- Fast, reliable wireless: Wi‑Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3 keep large file transfers snappy and accessories seamlessly connected.
- Effortless Apple ecosystem: Works beautifully with iPhone and iPad. Drag and drop with Universal Clipboard, take FaceTime calls, reply to Messages, and even run select iPhone and iPad apps right on your Mac.
- Built for comfort and security: Magic Keyboard with full‑height function keys and Touch ID for instant, secure unlocks and purchases.
- Crafted to last: Sleek all‑aluminum unibody in Space Gray with free software updates for years.
- Ready for big ideas: 16GB unified memory keeps everything responsive, and a fast 512GB SSD launches apps and opens files in a flash. Need even more? Configure up to 32GB memory with M2 Pro or step up to M2 Max for up to 96GB unified memory and up to a 38‑core GPU.

If you want a powerhouse that travels, a display that inspires, and a workflow that just works, the MacBook Pro M2 Pro is your next creative engine—beautiful, quiet, and insanely fast in Space Gray.
